section.name: Block Diagram
section.p: OWASP Security: Security Layer wrapped around the component and scrutinizes the each and every request for vulnerabilities.
ACL: Access Control Layer validates the request parameters and permits the request if it is matched with business rules defined for the user’s role.

RESTful API: A REST
compliant http interface provides programs for other components / browsers interaction.
Caching: A in memory storage, for storing/retrieving frequently accessed content.
Validation: Validates the data either index-able or not.
Bean Conversion:Transforms the XML data into a Java Object.
SOLR Conversion: Transforms the Java Object into a SOLR understandable Document.
Solr: An open source tool provides API for content searching.
